original_title: Queens Of The Stone Age – Songs For The Deaf (Real #1)
overview: Bonus DVD that was released with limited edition release of the album Songs For The Deaf. Featuring  1. Monsters In The Parasol (Live)  2. No Ones Knows (Live)  3. The Lost Art Of Keeping A Secret (Live)  4. Quick And To The Pointless (Live)  5. Ode To Clarissa (Live)
title: Queens Of The Stone Age – Songs For The Deaf (Real #1)
